snippet: The Garage Center for Contemporary Culture in Moscow, a nonprofit art center opened in 2008 by the heiress and collector Dasha Zhukova, has chosen Kate Fowle, a British-born curator who has been working for many years in New York.
abstract: The Garage Center for Contemporary Culture in Moscow, a nonprofit art center opened in 2008 by the heiress and collector Dasha Zhukova, has chosen Kate Fowle, a British-born curator who has been working for many years in New York.

headline.main: Russian Art Center Looks to the West for New Curator
headline.print_headline: Russian Art Center Looks West for Curator
